Text: RE po box Cc Rick et al I believe I know what is happening here With all the many changes lately within Enron we lost all our mailroom personnel and have replaced them with contract personnel It came to our attention that this group had not been informed of the international mailing system we had in place prior to all these changes I am waiting to hear from the new head man in the mail room to see if they have located these mailing for you I should hear back shortly today and hope to get this all straightened and mail forwarded ASAP Linda Original Message From Phillips Rick Sent Tuesday February AM To Hawkins Linda Chatham Gerry Subject po box Houston we have a problem None of us have received any mail addressed to us at the referenced po box for the past days this is very unusual and i was expecting some tax information sent by Mary Helen about days ago Please see if you can find out what is happening If it is discovered that our mail is still lounging somewhere please send it to our home addresses I also may have some tax mail that may have been sent to EB Please do a quick check for me Regards Rick Gerrry sorry you are ill get well soon

Jeff Sherrick Will Be Out of The OfficePlease note that Jeff Sherrick will be out of the office this entire week August August He will be checking his voicemail and emails periodically so please do not hesitate to leave Jeff a message However should you have something that needs to be addressed on an urgent basis please contact me and I will ensure that Jeff is notified promptly Thank you Linda Hawkins
